title: Hyundai IPO: A chaebol looks at India to break out of a Korean trap
description: Just as Indian stock markets are trading near record highs, Hyundai expects the listing of the equity shares in India "will enhance our visibility and brand image", and "provide liquidity and a public market" for the shares.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
